src:
Makabi moćan u Pireju, Baskonija deklasirala Bajern, Real prekinuo seriju poraza
01 Nov 2019, 23:20 by Darko
Šesto kolo Evrolige zaključeno je ubedljivim pobedama Makabija, Baskonije i Reala.
Makabi je bio moćan na gostovanju u Pireju, dva dana pošto je Olimpijakos iznenadio CSKA u Moskvi. „Ponos Izraela“ je dominirao od prvog do poslednjeg minuta i stigao do četvrte uzastopne pobede u Evroligi. Skoti Vilbekin i Tajler Dorsi su postigli po 19 poena, a Nejt Volters 10 poena za ekipu iz Tel Aviva. U Olimpijakosu je najefikasniji bio Printezis sa 16 poena. Nikola Milutinov, čiji je nastup zbog virusa bio neizvestan, proveo je na terenu 20 minuta i postigao tri poena, uz sedam skokova. Nisu se proslavila poslednja pojačanja crveno-belih iz Pireja. Tejlor Ročesti je postigao četiri, a Vili Rid jedan poen na debiju za Olimpijakos, koji ostaje na dve pobede i četiri poraza.
Baskonija je pregazila Bajern za treću pobedu u Evroligi. Sve je bilo poznato već posle prve četvrtine u kojoj je baskijski tim stekao 19 poena prednosti u odnosu na ekipu Dejana Radonjića.
Šengelija sa 19 i Džening sa 16 poena bili su najefikasniji u Baskoniji, a Monro sa 18 poena u Bajernu. Vladimir Lučić je za 22 minuta postigao četiri poena za Bavarce.
Sličan scenario je imao i duel u Madridu, gde je Real dobio Albu i prekinuo niz od tri poraza u Evroligi. Kraljevski klub je posle prve četvrtine imao 14 poena prednosti, „albatrosi“ su se vratili u igru u drugom periodu, ali nisu mogli do preokreta.
Rendolf, Garuba i Ljulj su postigli po 12 poena za Real, a Tavarez poen manje. Hermanson je sa 13 poena bio najefikasniji u ekipi iz Berlina.
Olimpijakos – Makabi 65:90 (21:24, 19:21, 16:23, 9:22)Baskonija – Bajern 93:60 (29:10, 23:19, 14:18, 27:13)Real Madrid – Alba 85:71 (28:14, 14:24, 22:18, 21:15)




POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Maccabi powerful in Piraeus, Basque Country declared Bayern, Real cut short the series of defeats
01 Nov 2019, 22:20 by Darko
The sixth round of the Euroleague concluded with a convincing victory for Maccabi, Basque Country and Real.
Maccabi was powerful on a visit to Piraeus, two days after Olympiacos surprised CSKA Moscow. Israel's pride dominated from the first to the last minute and reached the fourth consecutive Euroleague victory. Scotty Wilbeck and Tyler Dorsi each scored 19 points and Nate Walters 10 points for the Tel Aviv team. In Olympiakos, the most effective was Printezis with 16 points. Nikola Milutinov, whose appearance was unknown due to the virus, spent 20 minutes on the ground and scored three points with seven rebounds. The last reinforcements of the red and white of Piraeus were not celebrated. Taylor Rocheti scored four and Willie Reed one point on debut for Olympiakos, who remains on two wins and four losses.
Basque beat Bayern Munich for their third Euroleague victory. Everything was known after the first quarter, in which the Basque team gained 19 points over Dejan Radonjic's team.
Schengelia with 19 and Jenning with 16 points were the most efficient in Basque Country and Monroe with 18 points in Bayern. Vladimir Lucic scored four points for the Bavarians in 22 minutes.
A similar scenario was played in a duel in Madrid, where Real won Alba and cut off a series of three defeats in the Euroleague. The Royal Club had a 14 point lead after the first quarter, with the Albatross returning to play in the second period but unable to make the switch.
Randolph, Garuba and Ljulj scored 12 points each for Real and Tavarez points less. With 13 points, Hermanson was the most efficient on the Berlin team.
Olympiacos - Maccabi 65:90 (21:24, 19:21, 16:23, 9:22) Basque Country - Bayern 93:60 (29:10, 23:19, 14:18, 27:13) Real Madrid - Alba 85:71 (28:14, 14:24, 22:18, 21:15)
